description:
Plug in far away from home. This adapter connects an ungrounded 2-prong appliance to an outlet so you can keep your travel essentials powered. (Note that this adapter is not a voltage converter. Your device must be compatible with the voltage of the outlet you’re using.)

  • Includes 2 adapter plugs
  • Suitable for use with parallel 2-prong plugs found in North America, Mexico and Japan
  • Accepts non-grounded plugs only (not 3-prong)
name: Sea To Summit Travel Adaptors - USA Canada Japan
